name: Nobody in the Altar 1
description:
Free trial of horror & mystery visual novel published at Comic Market 96 and other coterie events! #visualnovel #horror #mystery #dark

           
---
■ Package

・ (Eng_Sub_Nobody_in_the_Altar_Hysteria_free_trial.exe)

---

■ Work information

Title: Nobody in the Altar free trial
Genre: Horror visual novel
Producer: Outer Palace (Guygoo)
Play time: About 2-3 hours
Production Tool: Tyrano Builder / Script
Operating environment: Windows7 / 8/10 etc.
Official website for the game: https://nobody-in-the-altar.jimdofree.com/

---
■ How to start up

(1)Click a girl's icon (Eng_Sub_Nobody_in_the_Altar_Hysteria_free_trial.exe)
(2)Keep wait for a minute.

* It takes time to start up. Please note that it may take up to 10 minutes depending on the PC.
If it cannot start, install it on another device.

---

■ Operation explanation:
Left click or Enter key and mouse wheel down: Advance / decide story button
Text log: "Log" button on the right side of the message window or on the mouse wheel
Skip function: Ctrl or "Skip" button below the message box. * Note !! The skip function of “Nobody_in_the_Altar_Hysteria_Part_2” is OFF by default.
If you cannot skip, open the setting screen with "Config" at the bottom of the message window and change the setting of "Unread Text Skip" at the bottom.
.
Note: * Note: “Nobody_in_the_Altar_Hysteria_Part2” excludes the full screen function due to the specifications of the production game tool.
       ※Note! ”Many of the options at the end of“ Nobody_in_the_Altar_Hysteria_Part2 ”have a time limit, so if you leave them unattended, the game will automatically over.
If you can save frequently, you can proceed with the scenario smoothly. *
.
